title: Quick Reference for Setting Up Trade Routes
author: Soren Harward

items.content:
## Trading
 - icon: watch
 - color: green
 - other names
   + mercantile
   + shipping
   + commercial
 - tradeable goods sold
    1. decrypted user data
    2. star silk
    3. comet droplets
    4. ion sphere
    5. teleport coordinators
 - sell to **advanced materials**

## Advanced Materials
 - icon: DNA
 - color: purple
 - other names
   + material fusion
   + alchemical
   + metal processing
   + ore processing
 - tradeable goods sold
   1. nanotube crate
   2. self-repairing heridium
   3. optical solvent
   4. five dimensional torus
   5. superconducting fibre
 - sell to **scientific**

## Scientific
 - icon: round flask
 - color: dark blue
 - other names
   + research
   + experimental
   + mathematical
 - tradeable goods sold
   1. de-scented pheromone bottle
   2. neutron microscope
   3. instability injector
   4. organic piping
   5. neural duct
 - sell to **trading**

## Mining
- icon: pickaxe
- color: orange
- other names
  + minerals
  + ore extraction
  + prospecting
- tradeable goods sold
  1. dirt
  2. unrefined pyrite grease
  3. bromide salt
  4. polychromatic zirconium
  5. re-latticed arc crystal
- sell to **manufacturing**

## Manufacturing
- icon: gears
- color: yellow
- other names
  + industrial
  + construction
  + mass production
- tradeable goods sold
  1. enormous metal cog
  2. non-stick piston
  3. six-pronged mesh decoupler
  4. holographic crankshaft
  5. high-capacity vector compressor
- sell to: **technology**

## Technology
- icon: microchip
- color: cyan
- other names
  - high tech
  - nano-construction
  - engineering
- tradeable goods sold
  1. decommissioned circuit board
  2. welding soap
  3. ion capacitor
  4. autonomous positioning unit
  5. quantum accelerator
- sell to: **power generation**

## Power Generation
- icon: battery
- color: red
- other names
  - energy supply
  - fuel generation
  - high voltage
- tradeable goods sold
  1. spark canister
  2. industrial-grade battery
  3. ohmic gel
  4. experimental power fluid
  5. fusion core
- sell to: **mining**
